title: The vision for it is a chat application... or more?(Suggestions for the app)
body:
In this post I'll try to say some ideas that I think will be pretty epic if done(and then say why I don't think they can all be done).

Basic Ideas:
1- TL;DR: Group chat.
As most people have been suggesting, we need a group chat feature so we can utilize this app as it was intended and that is to encourage teamwork and to give your team(your gang.... your homies.... your party {{item:3151}} ) a way to always be in contact.


2- TL;DR: See profile stats.
Having the ability to see match history/runes/masteries/etc. from within the app itself(this will work even better if done with idea.1 from the intermediate ideas)

3- TL;DR: Add statuses(is that even a word {{item:1057}} ) like Away.
An appear offline status or atleast "Away" so that you don't have to log out just so people dont message you expecting you to answer while you are neither on the phone nor the pc.

4- TL;DR: Most played and highest mastery champion visible.
Seeing their most played champions/highest mastery level champions.

Intermediate Ideas(Interactions with the client):
1- TL;DR: Edit runes and masteries(and Item Sets :D).
Having the ability to edit your runes and masteries(and even the thing that everybody forgets called Item Sets {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:4}} ) so we could interact with our summoner even when we aren't on our computers.

2- TL;DR: Change summoner icon.
Changing your summoner icon from within the application.

3- TL;DR: Seeing mastery levels.
Getting to see someone's mastery level on every champion.

Difficult Ideas(Mainly revolving around the idea of having a mini LoL client instead of a chat application):
1- TL;DR: Client Store.
Making a Client store within the application that you can buy things in with your IP/RP(but it should ask for your password before making a purchase just to make sure a friend playing with your phone doesn't troll you)

2- TL;DR: Charge RP.
The ability to charge RP through your phone(using the normal methods like paypal + maybe add using your google account on android --- should be password locked too).

I highly doubt any of the difficult ideas can be done here since it will require a remake of the app from near scratch to get good results as a "mini/mobile" client for LoL and as a programmer I know how hard and irritating that is + the app is already revealed I doubt they will make the players wait so long to add all these features before release but I had to get these ideas out of my brain somehow {{item:3460}} {{item:3174}}

replies.body: This is great feedback Ichigo, thank you for taking the time to write out everything! Please do keep sending feedback through the app with ideas and feelings; we are definitely listening. :DD
Thank you for the spirit boost!! You guys are the best :D {{summoner:1}} {{summoner:7}}
